item.title: Household Furniture Dumped overnight, 30th November
item.description:
A whole furniture suite was dumped on the side of the road. This is a regular occurrence at the location. As soon as the area is cleared more fly-tipping occurs. The local schoolchildren have put up no fly-tipping signs. Please could Bexley Council follow their lead and add signs, CCTV and prosecute. This is a blight for residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
